header.subtitle: Our Services
header.title: Every Homecare Service You Need, All in One Place

items.title: General Cleaning
items.description: Come home to a fresh space with bEasy - we handle the mess so you can enjoy what matters most.

items.title: Deep Cleaning
items.description: Get a fresh start with bEasy’s deep cleaning — we tackle hidden dirt and grime to restore your space to its best.

items.title: Office Cleaning
items.description: Brighten your workplace with bEasy’s office cleaning — return to a fresh space where everyone can focus and do their best.

items.title: Upholstery
items.description: Renew your furniture with bEasy’s upholstery cleaning — we remove stains, dust, and allergens for a fresher home.

items.title: Pest Control
items.description: Say goodbye to mosquitoes with our safe, powerful spray and fogging — protecting you and your loved ones from dengue and other viruses.

items.title: Washing Machine
items.description: Book washing machine cleaning to remove mold and dirt. Keep your washer hygienic, odor-free, and lasting longer—all via our app.

items.title: Post Renovation
items.description: Just renovated? Book a post-renovation cleaning in Phnom Penh through our app. We clear dust, paint, and debris to make your space move-in ready.

items.title: AC Cleaning
items.description: Stay cool and energy-efficient with our AC cleaning service in Phnom Penh. Get cleaner air, faster cooling, and lower bills—on-demand through our app.
